entry.title: WIND WARNING , Cartwright
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:46 PM AST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Cartwright
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:48 PM AST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -13.9°C
entry.summary:

Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 68 %

entry.title: Wednesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast overnight. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow and blowing snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early in the morning. Blowing snow. Amount 2 cm except 5 cm along parts of the coast. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 along parts of the coast. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast in the evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Wednesday 01 March 2023
